backend/main.mo: Main Motoko actor implementing surgery case management with user profiles, CRUD operations for cases, checklist tracking, and role-based access control using MixinAuthorization.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting the replacement of app icon/favicon with a custom dog-and-cat surgical image, listing affected files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Comprehensive summaries of all frontend source files describing components for authentication, case management, CSV import/export, search, validation, and UI theming.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables for light and dark themes, defining colors for UI elements like backgrounds, borders, and charts.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point forcing light color scheme, setting page title to 'Surgery Case Log', and linking to custom favicon with dog-and-cat icon.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component managing authentication flow, profile setup modal, case list view, forced light theme via ThemeProvider, and defensive MutationObserver to prevent dark mode.
frontend/src/features/auth/components/Lo: Button component for Internet Identity login/logout with query cache clearing on logout and disabled state during authentication.
frontend/src/features/auth/components/Pr: Modal dialog prompting first-time users to enter their name for profile creation with form validation and toast notifications.
frontend/src/features/cases/checklist.ts: Checklist configuration defining seven task items with default states, utility functions for default checklist creation, and getRemainingItems to filter checked tasks.
frontend/src/features/cases/components/C: Displays a surgery case as a card with patient details, checklist tasks, and action buttons (edit, delete). Handles task completion and case deletion with confirmation dialogs.

Modal dialog for creating/editing surgery cases with form fields, AI-powered structured text parsing, MRN-based auto-prefill, and checklist editor. Tracks user-edited fields to avoid overwriting manual changes.
Main view component that displays a searchable grid of case cards with create/import/export actions. Shows loading state and empty states for no cases or no search results.
Search input component with icon for filtering cases by any field.
Renders a list of checkboxes for surgery case checklist items (discharge notes, labs, imaging, etc.) with toggle functionality.
Provides buttons to export cases to CSV and import cases from CSV file, handling create/update operations and error reporting.
frontend/src/features/cases/components/D: Date input component combining native date input with calendar popover picker, handling date parsing and validation in local timezone.
Implements CSV export/import logic for surgery cases, including data serialization, parsing, validation, and matching with existing cases by MRN.
frontend/src/features/cases/csv/caseCsvS: Defines CSV column headers and TypeScript types for case CSV import/export operations.
frontend/src/features/cases/parsing/pars: Parses structured text in label:value format (e.g., 'MRN: 12345') and extracts case information into a partial CaseFormData object, handling multiple label variations and validating species, sex, and dates.
frontend/src/features/cases/search.ts: Implements case search functionality that filters SurgeryCase arrays by matching query strings against text fields, dates, species/sex labels, and checklist items.
frontend/src/features/cases/types.ts: Defines TypeScript types and constants for case forms, including SPECIES_OPTIONS, SEX_OPTIONS, and the CaseFormData interface with fields for medical records, pet/owner info, and dates.
frontend/src/features/cases/validation.t: Provides validation and parsing functions for case form fields including required field checks, species/sex parsing with fuzzy matching, and date parsing supporting ISO and slash-separated formats.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook that manages the backend actor instance with authentication, creating actors based on Internet Identity state and initializing access control with admin tokens from URL parameters.
frontend/src/hooks/useDebouncedValue.ts: React hook that debounces a changing value with a configurable delay (default 500ms) using setTimeout and cleanup.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides React context and hooks for Internet Identity authentication, managing login/logout flow, identity persistence, and authentication status with configurable AuthClient options.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for all backend operations including user profile management and CRUD operations for surgery cases, with automatic cache invalidation on mutations.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables defining a light blue color scheme with white surfaces, blue primary colors, and orange accent colors for presenting complaints.
frontend/src/lib/utils.ts: Utility function that combines clsx and tailwind-merge to merge Tailwind CSS class names with proper conflict resolution.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React root with QueryClient provider and InternetIdentity provider wrapping the main App component.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for extracting, storing, and managing URL parameters from both regular query strings and hash-based routing, with sessionStorage persistence support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining custom color scheme using OKLCH color space, container settings, typography, animations, and various UI component styling tokens.
project_state.json: Project metadata tracking a fix request to replace the app icon/favicon with a user-uploaded image of a black dog and orange cat with a surgical scalpel on blue background.
